au.com.cybersearch2.classyjpa.transaction

Class TransactionState

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.cybersearch2.classyjpa.transaction.TransactionState

  • public class TransactionState
extends Object
    TransactionState Database connection management to enable transaction begin(), commit() and rollback()

    Andrew Bowley 09/05/2014
